title: the moment a Man gets married, his life is over, why do guys keep ruining their lives?
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x9FocQK9L4Q

http://static.fjcdn.com/pictures/Bill+burr+on+marriage_4ad65b_4910236.jpg

till death do us part - because why do it the smart way, and be happy. when we can get the government involved and be stuck with each other forever no matter what happens.
